Uses of Class
org.netbeans.api.autoupdate.OperationException

  • Packages that use OperationException 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.autoupdate
    Services for searching, downloading and installing NBM with new functionality or updates of installed modules.
    org.netbeans.spi.autoupdate
    The provider this SPI can be plugged into Autoupdate's Updates Providers and can supply NBM to Autoupdate Services.
